Arrow looks at Stiller and then at Burning Hammer.

Arrow: You take Perplex=
 back inside.

Burning Hammer nods and Arrow approaches Stiller...

  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 10:46 PM
  Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack.=
.. again/Clash


  STILLER




  (Stiller's smile grow larger as he waits f=
or Arrow...)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
=
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 1:21 AM
   =
 Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    Arrow approaches =
Stiller, looking very angry...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      F=
rom: *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July=
 07, 2001 8:05 PM
      Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash
=


      STILLER





      (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow in it's ho=
lster. He clutches his fists and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fist fight. =
Stiller motions for Arrow to come...)

        ----- Original Message -----=
 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
  Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 6:29 PM
        Subject: Re: Chivtrons unde=
r attack... again/Clash


        Arrow ducks the arrow (heehee) and fires =
back 7 shots at Stiller...

          ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
   From: *Orchid* 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sa=
turday, July 07, 2001 5:17 AM
          Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack=
... again/Clash


          MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / =
LEE / DEPP





          (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires =
a missile at Nightlight.)



          (Barrymore takes one of the energy b=
alls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fires 6 laser =
beams at Nightlight.)



          (Depp is struck by both energy balls, ta=
king them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Nightlight.)



     =
     (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pin from a grenade and throws=
 it in front of the Chivtron base.)



          (Stiller growls and fires =
an arrow at Arrow.)



          (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's =
legs, attempting to trip her up.)



          (Virgo fires a red energy dr=
aining dart at Nightlight...)
            ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
         From: airly2000@... 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

            Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 2:35 AM
            Subject: Chi=
vtrons under attack... again/Clash


            Nightlight::

            =
Nightlight tried to defend herself, and dificulty she could avoid the 
    =
        attacks of McGowan and Stronghold, She fired 2 energy balls to 
   =
         McGowan, 2 against Barrymore, 2 agaisnt Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
 =
           against Airbomber, 2 agaisnt Stranato and 2 against Stronghold. =
But 
            she was hit by the combined attack of Barrymore and Strana=
to, doing 
            her fell. 

            She felt stunned and she wou=
ld be defendless a short while.
